mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET_INFO ( ID, ITEM_NAME, MARKET_NAME, GRADE, UNIT, AVG_PRICE, MAX_PRICE, MIN_PRICE ) VALUES ( MARKET_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemName}, #{marketName}, #{grade}, #{unit}, #{avgPrice}, #{maxPrice}, #{minPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ITEM_NAME AS itemName, MARKET_NAME AS marketName, GRADE, UNIT, AVG_PRICE AS avgPrice, MAX_PRICE AS maxPrice, MIN_PRICE AS minPrice FROM MARKET_INFO ORDER BY ID DESC
